meta_info.name: PARTY
meta_info.description: Ancestor of all Party types, including real world entities and their roles. A Party is any entity which can participate in an activity. The `_name_` attribute inherited from `LOCATABLE` is used to indicate the actual type of party (note that the actual names, i.e. identities of parties are indicated in the `_identities_` attribute, not the `_name_` attribute).

functions.name: type
functions.meaning: Type of party, such as  `PERSON`,  `ORGANISATION`, etc. Role name, e.g.  general practitioner ,  nurse ,  private citizen . Taken from inherited `_name_` attribute.

attributes.name: identities
attributes.description: Identities used by the party to identify itself, such as legal name, stage names, aliases, nicknames and so on.

attributes.name: details
attributes.description: All other details for this Party.

attributes.name: reverse_relationships
attributes.description: References to relationships in which this Party takes part as target.

attributes.name: relationships
attributes.description: Relationships in which this Party takes part as source.
